---
title: "Jet-lagged"
---

### Jet-lagged

those hours<br>
those three or four<br>

those hours when everyone<br>
and their suns are sleeping off<br>
in another room<br>

food will not do<br>
nor water nor wine<br>

how cold<br>
those hours<br>

how uncertain<br>
these few<br>

waiting to be<br>
reborn<br>

<br>
